to esteem/to think highly of/to accord importance to/to revere
Chongzhou county level city in Chengdu 成都[Cheng2 du1], Sichuan
Chongzhou county level city in Chengdu 成都[Cheng2 du1], Sichuan
Chongzhen, reign name of last Ming emperor (1628-1644)

sentences.english: Chongzhen suicided together with a eunuch Wang Chengen.
sentences.chinese: 崇自殺連同一個太監王成恩。

sentences.english: He changed the year to Yongchang, and marched towards Beijing to throw over Emperor Chongzhen.
sentences.chinese: 他改變了今年永昌，並行進到北京丟了皇帝崇。

sentences.english: He served as eastern Zhejiang An Fusi Services Officer, rank over, lifting Taizhou worship Taoist.
sentences.chinese: 後任浙東安撫司參議官，秩滿，提舉台州崇道觀。

sentences.english: Emperor Chongzhen noticed the threat, so he ordered Hong Chengchou to fight against Li.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝崇察覺威脅，所以他下令紅啦打擊力。

sentences.english: To pledge myself uphold and practice the ideals of Zonta.
sentences.chinese: 以一己赤誠，維護和實行崇她理想。

definition: to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
